docs.snippet: Pope Francis condemned the legalization of recreational drugs as a flawed and failed experiment on Friday, lending his voice to a debate which is raging from the U.S. to Uruguay and beyond.
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis condemned the legalization of recreational drugs as a flawed and failed experiment on Friday, lending his voice to a debate which is raging from the U.S. to Uruguay and beyond.

headline.main: Pope to Legalizing Recreational Drugs: Just Say No
headline.print_headline: Pope to Legalizing Recreational Drugs: Just Say No

docs.snippet: The world players' union accused World Cup organizer FIFA on Friday of failing to protect Uruguay midfielder Alvaro Pereira after he played on following a hard blow to the head he said felt "like the lights went out."
docs.lead_paragraph: The world players' union accused World Cup organizer FIFA on Friday of failing to protect Uruguay midfielder Alvaro Pereira after he played on following a hard blow to the head he said felt "like the lights went out."

headline.main: Union Wants Probe of Player Head Blow at World Cup
headline.print_headline: Union Wants Probe of Player Head Blow at World Cup

docs.snippet: Italy striker Mario Balotelli may have put the kiss of death on England with his winning goal at their World Cup opener, but now he wants royal recompense if he becomes their savior.
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy striker Mario Balotelli may have put the kiss of death on England with his winning goal at their World Cup opener, but now he wants royal recompense if he becomes their savior.

headline.main: Soccer-Balotelli Wants Kiss From Queen if Helps England

docs.snippet: FIFA has replaced the Colombian assistant referee whose offside decisions denied Mexico two potential goals against Cameroon.

docs.snippet: Pope Francis warned on Friday against legalizing drugs, calling addiction an "evil" which he said had to be resisted without compromise.

headline.print_headline: Pope Francis Warns on 'Evil' of Drugs, Opposes Legalization

docs.snippet: Players who suffer suspected concussion during a game should be temporarily substituted while their condition is evaluated, the world players' union FIFPro said on Friday.

docs.snippet: England will make World Cup history if they qualify from the group stage after losing their first two matches.

docs.snippet: When Costa Rica headed to halftime down by 1-0 to Uruguay, few expected what came next: three unanswered goals and a team-defining win. But will this long shot be simply a one-hit wonder? Italy will be better organized and more professional than...
docs.abstract: When Costa Rica headed to halftime down by 1-0 to Uruguay, few expected what came next: three unanswered goals and a team-defining win. But will this long shot be simply a one-hit wonder? Italy will be better organized and more professional than Uruguay.

headline.main: Costa Rica vs. Italy: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: No excuses. No one to blame but themselves. Feeble defending has sent England home from the World Cup.
